name: @kattebak/markdown-confluence-cli
description: Synchronize markdown files to a confluence page

scripts.test: tsc --noEmit && biome check src && node --import tsx --test src/**/*.test.ts
scripts.start: source .envrc && npx tsx src/cli.ts -f README.md -u $CONFLUENCE_USER -t $CONFLUENCE_TOKEN -d $CONFLUENCE_DOMAIN -i $CONFLUENCE_SPACE_ID list

author: Matthijs van Henten
